attributes.action: Get Gillian Gibbons out of a sudan prison now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gillian Gibbons was arrested and convicted of inciting religious hatred because she asked CHILDREN to name a teddy bear.  They chose Mohammed not her!  This is madness.  The british government should get themselves over to Sudan and definitly STOP all aid to them untill Gillian Gibbons Is released with appologies and safely back home in a country where you can safely name a teddy bear Steve McClaren if you want to!  Lets face it, in this country any name you can give your child, you can name a pet or cuddly toy the same!

rejection.details: Mrs Gibbons has now been released.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
